key.description: Ignore all tls errors regarding the connection to the rss server

key.name: feedreader-autostart
key.description: on startup of the daemon copy the desktop file in the autostart folder

key.name: parser-api-key
key.description: Acces key to parser-API of redability.com

key.description: start a sync as soon as the UI is started
